comments: Perforation patterns for punctured convolutional codes (4,1).Apparently Begin's paper was presented at a poster session at the conference and was never published.
references: G. Begin, On the enumeration of perforation patterns for punctured convolutional codes, Séries Formelles et Combinatoire Algébrique, 4th colloquium, 15-19 Juin 1992, Montréal, Université du Québec à Montréal, pp. 1-10.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 07 2004 following a suggestion of _Ralf Stephan_
Reedited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 31 2008 following a suggestion of _R. J. Mathar_
